title: Bug with my Club
body:
Throwback here but...

You remember when clubs died for a few days? Well, I never got mine back. Well, it's still there. And to the members of my Club I'm still the owner. But I have no access to it.

So yeah :/

replies.body: Oh yes I remember those dark days.  :P  No worries, let me help!  What's the club name and tag?

Club name is Bad Time and the club is bdtem, sorry for the late response!
Thank you!
Sync'd!  Your club should be visible once again!
